text: Ezɨ Israelian atrivim uan mɨdorozir gumazibar diazɨ, me iza uari akuvagha, mɨdorozir bizibar kɨri. Egha me ghua danganir Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba itimɨn boroghɨra ghugha, danganir pumuning aghuigha aningɨn iti. Israelian ikɨzim, a bar suvigha, mati memen okoruar bar muziarir pumuning. Ezɨ Sirian mɨdorozir gumaziba bar avɨrasemegha tintinibar danganiba bar dar iti.
